name: Classic Margherita Pizza
author: Alice Johnson
steps: In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, sugar, and yeast.
Gradually add warm water and olive oil. Mix until a dough forms.
Knead the dough on a floured surface for 10 minutes.
Let the dough rise for 1 hour in a warm place.
Preheat the oven to 220째C (430째F).
Roll out the dough and place it on a pizza pan.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Top with mozzarella and fresh basil.
Bake for 15 minutes or until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
author: Charlie Brown
steps: Preheat the oven to 200째C (390째F).
Grease 4 ramekins and set aside.
Melt the chocolate and butter together in a double boiler.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick.
Fold the melted chocolate into the egg mixture.
Sift in the flour and add vanilla extract and salt.
Divide the batter among the ramekins.
Bake for 12 minutes until the edges are set but the center is gooey.
Serve immediately with a dusting of powdered sugar.

name: Fresh Summer Salad
author: Alice Johnson
steps: In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions.
Crumble feta cheese over the top.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Toss everything gently to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a refreshing side or light main dish.
